reviews.name: Eleanor
reviews.subject: I love Fast and Free Tights (Asia Fit)
reviews.comment: Fast and Free Tights are always so comfortable. It's my 3rd pair. Love all of them.

reviews.name: JeanWu
reviews.subject: Such a great deal!
reviews.comment: My first fast and free was bought several years ago and it’s still in good condition! I’m so happy to get a 50% discount this time and I really love the colour which is a mix of blue and purple!
